```{r}
output$browserAdvice = renderText({
  text = ""
  if(! input$isSafari )
    text =  "Please use Safari as your browser for full features."
  text
})

div(
  tagAppendAttributes(
    textOutput('browserAdvice'),
    style=paste(
      'display: flex; justify-content: flex-center;',
      'color:red; background: lightgrey;
      font-weight:bold; font-size:larger'))
)
```
